messages.message: I love the new ocr cfg options editor! However there are some niche options that aren't covered in that selector, how can I continue to edit the ocr cfg manually with the new UI? I feel like having an "advanced" mode where you can still manually edit the json would be nice.

@Eric Han I think Tami's suggestion makes sense, we should still allow users to edit the JSON directly if they want

@Aaron Tami as a hack you can inspect element and remove the "disabled"  field in text area
OK cool, ya there are a lot of ocr cfg options that I am the only user of haha, i still need to be able to access those, but we don't really want to expose them as commonly used options
The work around is to just edit the flow directly. I’ll add an advanced mode this week
